title: Lethality change
body: So I just realized this, and I don't know how it took so long, but because ArPen became Lethality, my runes are gone. That's kind of... Not cool at all.

replies.body: That's pretty weird! You don't have Lethality runes that replaced them in your collection or on your rune pages?

I do not. It's possible I just am not remembering that I forgot to buy them in favor of mag pen runes though. I took a bit of a break last year. I tried to look through my purchase history to check, but it doesn't go very far back. I could swear I bought both though. Ah well, it's probably my mistake now that I'm looking through everything.

Weird! I just looked at your account and see them, so you must be experiencing a visual bug. I recommend swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen before looking at your runes again:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

I hope they showed up this time!
Everything is all good now. Thank you very much for the replies and the fix. I appreciate it ^_^
